metadata.title: Genie 3 - AI Image to Video Generator
metadata.description: Transform your static images into dynamic videos with Genie 3's powerful AI technology.
metadata.keywords: genie 3, image to video, AI video generation, photo animation, video creator, AI video maker, image animation

ImageToVideo.title: AI Image to Video
ImageToVideo.description: Transform your static images into dynamic videos with Genie 3's powerful AI technology. Simply upload an image and describe the effect you want.

createVideo.title: Create Your Video
createVideo.description: Upload images and add prompts, AI will generate amazing video content for you

uploadArea.clickOrDrop: Click to upload or drag image here
uploadArea.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF formats, size up to 10MB

prompt.title: Video Description Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Please describe the effect you want in the video, e.g.: character moves from left to right, leaves in the background sway in the wind, camera slowly pushes in...
prompt.tip: The more detailed the prompt, the better the video will match your expectations

alerts.requireInput: Please upload at least the first frame image and enter a prompt
alerts.error: Failed to generate video, please try again

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Upload your first frame image, and optionally the last frame image if you want to control the ending state

describe.title: Describe Effect
describe.description: Describe in detail the video effect you want, including movement style, camera changes, etc.

generate.title: Generate Video
generate.description: Click the generate button, AI will create amazing video content based on your input
